body.text: Hi, I’m the DOH chatbot and I’m new. Thank you for your patience as we develop this new service. If I am not able to answer your question, or if you find a problem with my system that you’d like to report, please send an email to [DOH.information@doh.wa.gov](mailto:DOH.information@doh.wa.gov).

items.text: Type your question or pick one of these most frequently asked questions.
[Email us](mailto:DOH.information@doh.wa.gov) if I am not able to anwer your question or to report a problem with the system.
